seo.title: Best Restaurants in Corniglia 2025 | Authentic Local Dining
seo.description: Discover authentic trattorias and restaurants in Corniglia. Traditional Ligurian cuisine, local wines, family-run establishments serving generations of recipes.

body.title: Authentic Local Restaurants
body.subtitle: Traditional trattorias serving local families for generations. Taste genuine Ligurian recipes with excellent local wines.

features.title: Osteria Mananan
features.description: Legendary family-run restaurant on the main square. Famous for fresh pasta and seafood. Reserve in advance.

features.title: Enoteca Il Pirun
features.description: Wine bar with excellent selection of local Vernaccia. Light meals, cheese boards, and stunning terrace views.

features.title: A Cantina de Mananan
features.description: Cozy wine cellar atmosphere. Traditional Ligurian dishes with excellent wine pairings from family vineyards.

features.title: Gelateria Alberto
features.description: Local favorite for gelato and quick bites. Try the local focaccia and fresh fruit gelato.

features.title: Bar Terza Terra
features.description: Main village bar for morning coffee and aperitivo. Locals gather here - authentic atmosphere guaranteed.

features.title: Ristorante Cecio
features.description: Family restaurant with panoramic terrace. Home-style cooking with generous portions and reasonable prices.
